title: [Large-Scale] Generative AI-Enhanced Science Lesson Design: Pre-Service Teacher Practice Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Device Proficiency and Understanding of Elementary Science Curriculum
context.additional_context: Learning to utilize generative AI tools for science-focused lesson design, with project-based assessments requiring submission of actual lesson plans

learning_goals: Learners can create lesson design documents, including science class objectives, activities, and assessment plans, using generative AI tools.
Learners can perform an iterative process of critically reviewing AI-generated outputs and improving them for educational contexts.
Learners can evaluate the validity of AI-integrated science classes based on the TPACK (Technological, Pedagogical, and Content Knowledge) framework.

resources: TPACK (Technological Pedagogical Content Knowledge) Assessment Rubric

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
